meanings.meaning_en_US: To comfort someone in a time of grief or disappointment.

examples.sentence: I tried to [console] my friend after her loss.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我試著在她失去後安慰我的朋友。

examples.sentence: He offered to [console] her with words of kindness.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他提出用親切的話語來安慰她。

examples.sentence: The coach [consoled] the players after their defeat.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 教練在他們失敗後安慰了隊員們。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The transmission of information over significant distances by electronic means.

examples.sentence: Telecommunications is essential in modern society.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 電信在現代社會至關重要

examples.sentence: We rely on [telecommunications] for global connectivity.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們依賴電信實現全球連接

examples.sentence: Advancements in [telecommunications] have changed the way we communicate.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 電信的進步改變了我們交流的方式

meanings.meaning_en_US: The supreme legislative body in a country.

examples.sentence: The new laws were passed by the [parliament].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這些新法案是由國會通過的。

examples.sentence: Every member of the [parliament] has a duty to represent their constituents.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每位國會成員都有責任代表其選民。

examples.sentence: The debate lasted long into the night in the [parliament].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 辯論持續到深夜在國會進行。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The way in which the parts of something are arranged or laid out.

examples.sentence: The [layout] of the website is very user-friendly.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該網站的佈局非常友好。

examples.sentence: They made a few changes to the [layout] of the room.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們對房間的佈局進行了一些改動。

examples.sentence: The magazine's [layout] is modern and appealing.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這本雜誌的佈局現代又吸引人。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To plan and direct the course of a journey.

examples.sentence: They used the stars to [navigate] the vast ocean.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們用星星來導航廣闊的海洋。

examples.sentence: It's essential to [navigate] through the city streets carefully.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在城市街道中小心導航是至關重要的。

examples.sentence: She learned how to [navigate] using a map and compass.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她學會了如何使用地圖和指南針導航。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Causing or inducing awe; stunning.

examples.sentence: The view from the mountain was absolutely [awesome].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 從山上的景色絕對令人敬畏。

examples.sentence: She had an [awesome] experience skydiving.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她跳傘的經歷非常令人敬畏。

examples.sentence: His performance was [awesome] and received a standing ovation.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的表演令人敬畏，獲得了全場起立鼓掌。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A small container or wrapped package.

examples.sentence: She received a [packet] of seeds in the mail.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她收到一包種子

examples.sentence: Please open the [packet] carefully.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請小心打開這包裹

examples.sentence: The [packet] contains important documents.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該包裹包含重要文件

meanings.meaning_en_US: The action of making new or secret information known.

examples.sentence: The [disclosure] of the report shocked everyone.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 報告的揭露震驚了所有人。

examples.sentence: Full [disclosure] of the facts is necessary.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 完全揭露事實是必要的。

examples.sentence: They required a [disclosure] statement.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們要求一份揭露聲明。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A division or section of a hospital.

examples.sentence: The nurse took me to the children's [ward].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 護士帶我去兒童病房。

examples.sentence: Each [ward] has its own team of doctors.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 每個病房都有自己的醫生團隊。

examples.sentence: I visited my friend in the surgical [ward].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我去外科病房看望我的朋友。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A system of physical postures, breathing techniques, and meditation for physical and mental well-being.

examples.sentence: I practice [yoga] every morning to stay fit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我每天早上練習瑜伽以保持健身。

examples.sentence: Yoga helps improve flexibility and reduce stress.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 瑜伽有助於改善柔韌性並減少壓力。

examples.sentence: She joined a [yoga] class last month.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她上個月參加了一個瑜伽課。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To be exceptionally good at or proficient in an activity or subject.

examples.sentence: She does not just do well; she [excels] in mathematics.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她不僅表現良好；她在數學方面突出。

examples.sentence: Students who [excel] are often rewarded.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 表現突出學生通常會受到獎勵。

examples.sentence: He aims to [excel] in his career.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的目標是職業上突出。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A silvery-white metallic element used in many products.

examples.sentence: The can is made of [aluminum].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個罐子是用鋁製成的。

examples.sentence: Aluminum is lightweight and resistant to corrosion.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 鋁質輕且耐腐蝕。

examples.sentence: She used [aluminum] foil to wrap the food.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她用鋁箔包裹食物。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The quality of being exact and accurate.

examples.sentence: The [precision] of the instrument is impressive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個儀器的精確性令人印象深刻。

examples.sentence: He performed the task with great [precision].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他以極高的精確性完成了這個任務。

examples.sentence: They measured the angles with utmost [precision].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們以極大的精確性測量了角度。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A combination of two different elements.

examples.sentence: The new car model is a [hybrid] of electric and gasoline power.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這款新車型是電動和汽油動力的混合物

examples.sentence: She created a [hybrid] recipe combining Italian and Mexican cuisine.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她創造了一個結合義大利和墨西哥料理的混合食譜

examples.sentence: Many plants are [hybrid] varieties designed for better yield.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多植物是為了更好的產量而設計的混合品種

meanings.meaning_en_US: A type of fuel used in diesel engines, derived from crude oil.

examples.sentence: The bus runs on [diesel].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這輛公車使用柴油。

examples.sentence: Prices for [diesel] fuel have increased this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 今年柴油價格已上漲。

examples.sentence: He filled the tank with [diesel] before the trip.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在出發前把油箱加滿了柴油。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The action of suspending someone or something or the condition of being suspended.

examples.sentence: His [suspension] from school was due to repeated violations.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他因違規多次而被暫停學校的學籍。

examples.sentence: The [suspension] of the project was announced last week.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該項目的暫停上周已經宣布。

examples.sentence: She faced [suspension] from her job after the incident.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 事件後她面臨暫停工作的處罰。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Something that is added to complete a thing or make up for a deficiency.

examples.sentence: He takes a vitamin [supplement] every day.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他每天都吃維他命補充物。

examples.sentence: The diet offers a [supplement] to ensure adequate nutrition.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這種飲食提供補充物，以確保充足的營養。

examples.sentence: You can buy protein [supplements] at any health store.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以在任何健康商店購買蛋白質補充物。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The teaching or revelation of Christ.

examples.sentence: They preached the [gospel] to the crowd.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們向人群傳播福音

examples.sentence: The [gospel] is a source of hope.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 福音是希望的來源

examples.sentence: Many songs are written about the [gospel].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多歌曲是關於福音的

meanings.meaning_en_US: Awaiting a decision or conclusion.

examples.sentence: The application is still [pending] approval.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個申請仍在等待批准。

examples.sentence: There are several [pending] tasks on my list.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我的清單上有幾個待完成的任務。

examples.sentence: Her promotion is [pending] further review.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她的升遷正在進一步審查中。

meanings.meaning_en_US: An unmarried man.

examples.sentence: He is a happy [bachelor] who enjoys his freedom.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他是一個快樂的單身漢，享受他的自由。

examples.sentence: Many [bachelors] live alone in the city.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多單身漢獨自在城市裡生活。

examples.sentence: She believes every [bachelor] should learn to cook.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她認為每個單身漢都應該學會做飯。
